message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on adapting visual question answering models for automated category classification and expert retrieval on image-based questions in community question & answering platforms. This involves leveraging representation learning for text and images, which are key areas of research in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques for improving the performance of the adapted models. Finally, the paper analyzes the differences between visual QA and community QA data, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM) research.
